trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the category in which to group the property or event when displayed in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"></xref> control set to Categorized mode.

A <xref:System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute> indicates the category to associate the associated property or event with, when listing properties or events in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> control set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertySort.Categorized> mode.
If a <xref:System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute> has not been applied to a property or event, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> associates it with the **Misc** category.
A new category can be created for any name by specifying the name of the category in the constructor for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute>.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute.Category%2A> property indicates the name of the category that the attribute represents.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute.Category%2A> property also provides transparent localization of category names.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> class using the category name Default.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> class using the specified category name.

If the name you provide for the `category` parameter is one of the predefined category names, the name will be automatically localized by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute.Category%2A> property.

If the name you provide is not a predefined category name, and you do not override the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute.GetLocalizedString%2A> method to provide a localized name, the category name will not be localized.
The name of the category.
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the Action category.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the action category.
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the Appearance category.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the appearance category.
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the Asynchronous category.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the asynchronous category.
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the Behavior category.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the behavior category.
Gets the name of the category for the property or event that this attribute is applied to.
This property calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute.GetLocalizedString%2A> to get the localized name of the category the first time it is accessed.
The name of the category for the property or event that this attribute is applied to.
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the Data category.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the data category.
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the Default category.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the default category.
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the Design category.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the design category.
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the DragDrop category.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the drag-and-drop category.
Returns whether the value of the given object is equal to the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref>..
The object to test the value equality of.
`true` if the value of the given object is equal to that of the current; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the Focus category.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the focus category.
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the Format category.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the format category.
Returns the hash code for this attribute.
A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
Looks up the localized name of the specified category.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute.Category%2A> property calls this method the first time it is accessed to look up the localized name for the specified category.
The identifer for the category to look up.
The localized name of the category, or `null` if a localized name does not exist.
Determines if this attribute is the default.
`true` if the attribute is the default value for this attribute class; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the Key category.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the key category.
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the Layout category.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the layout category.
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the Mouse category.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the mouse category.
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the WindowStyle category.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the window style category.
